ref10 - public domain, implementation from supercop
http://bench.cr.yp.to/supercop/supercop-20171020.tar.xz
crypo_sign\ed25519\ref10


sha3 - public domain CC0,
Common\brg_endian.h - is copyrighted by Brian Gladman and comes with a BSD 3-clause license
implementation from Keccak repository:
https://github.com/gvanas/KeccakCodePackage 3f441eb7090771a7611682a63fa9caa1dd85e387

Common\*
Modes\KeccakHash
Constructions\KeccakSpongeWidth1600
Constructions\KeccakSponge.inc
Constructions\KeccakSponge-common
Snp\KecccakP-1600\Optimized64\KeccakP-1600*
Snp\KecccakP-1600\Optimized64\ufull\*
Snp\KecccakP-1600\Optimized\*
Snp\KecccakP-1600\Snp-Relaned.h

ripemd160 - MIT BSD, implementation of the ripemd160 algorithm:
https://github.com/rustyrussell/ccan.git 7082f7d0e81911acb26787949c251dfb298cbdd8
ccan/crypto/ripemd160/
ccan/compiler/compiler.h
ccan/endian/endian.h

vectors:
https://homes.esat.kuleuven.be/~bosselae/ripemd160.html
